sections.markdown:
##### 1. Open Logs App
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/open-logs-app.webp)

##### 2. Filter for ERROR or WARN Logs
![](https://github.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/raw/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/logs-filter-error.webp)

##### 3. Filter for `trace_id != null`
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/logs-filter-complex.webp)

##### 4. Filter for `otel-demo` K8s Namespace
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/logs-filter-namespace.gif)

##### 5. Click on the Log record and explore the log attributes by scrolling down
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/log-attribute-explorer.gif)

##### 6. Click `Open trace` and explore the Distributed Tracing app* 
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rohanshah-sre/LogsWorkshop/refs/heads/main/docs/imgs/navigate-to-trace-app.gif)
